txt.en:
'There are four ingredients I need you to gather in order to create this salve.

'I require marsh-strider bark, from the marshes of Zahumakh. I also need unblemished bog flowers that grow near there.

'I need scorpion venom, from the scorpion dens of Dûlagig. I also require unblemished berries that grow in the scrub brush near Dûlagig.'
Gather ingredients for Cúridwan: marsh-strider bark and bog flowers from the marsh at Zahûmakh to the east of Kûgrun, scorpion venom and berries from Dûlagig to the north of Kûgrun.

'I wish we had more time to talk, [placeholder]. I see great things in you.\n\n'I believe our paths will cross again after this. But for now, gather these ingredients for me, and we may yet stop the Lâg Dávrit in its tracks. The Adúrhid of Imhûlar will not breathe their last if I can help it. Bring me those ingredients, and quickly, and the Adúrhid will have their miracle.'
Thank Cúridwan for her aid in the Kintai's plight
Return to Cúridwan in Kûgrun with the ingredients you've gathered
Gather bog flowers from the marsh at Zahûmakh ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Here we are. I knew we'd make it. I know this cave like the back of my own hand.'
Ask Cúridwan about the ingredients necessary for the salve
Gather bark from marsh-striders at Zahûmakh ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Go quickly. Collect the ingredients and bring them straight back here. I believe that Cúridwan can do as she says. I have seen wondrous things from her before, things you would not believe if I told you. She can save the Kintai and reverse the Lâg Dávrit.'
Gather wild berries from Dûlagig ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Are you ready? It's time to meet her.'
'Are you ready? It's time to meet her. Go through the cave door behind me. She is waiting.'
Gather scorpion venom from Dûlagig ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Kûgrun is still lush and vibrant, untouched by the Pale Blight beyond
Speak with Usakâr by the cave door.
Enter the cave and find Cúridwan to ascertain whether she can help you cure the Lâg Dávrit.
Speak with Usakâr in Kûgrun.
Go through the cave entrance and enter Kûgrun, home of Cúridwan.
Speak with Cúridwan, the Golden Maiden by her cottage.

'Cúridwan? Ah, yes, the Adúrhid do call me that. I have many names, but that one suits me as well any.

'The Lâg Dávrit? Yes, as you can see, I've been fighting it in my own way, and recently I've made a breakthrough of sorts. A salve I've made that I believe can reverse the Pale Blight and restore the natural way of things. But I have quite run out of ingredients.

'I can help you, and the Kintai, but I need your help in collecting more of the ingredients for this salve.'
Speak with Usakâr by the cave door.
Speak with Usakâr by the cave door
Go through the cave entrance and enter Kûgrun
Gathered bog flowers from the marsh at Zahûmakh ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gathered bark from marsh-striders at Zahûmakh ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Let's see, do we have everything here? Venom, bark, berries, bog.... Seems so! Give me just a moment then....\n\n'There. Those items have been fashioned together. Now it needs to sit for several hours and steep to properly finish it. While it does, I believe there is one more thing we must do in order for this salve to work permanently, and not merely be a passing hope for the Kintai.'
Speak with Cúridwan, the Golden Maiden by her home
Gathered wild berries from Dûlagig ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Kûgrun. My home, my golden sanctuary. It is impossible for many to find, but impossible for others to miss. Those who seek out its comforts in good faith find welcome company, and sometimes, even answers to seemingly impossible questions.'
Gathered scorpion venom from Dûlagig ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Return to Cúridwan in Kûgrun with the ingredients you've gathered.
Speak with Usakâr in Kûgrun
Ask Cúridwan about the ingredients necessary for the salve.
Speak with Usakâr when you are ready to go
Thank Cúridwan for her aid in the Kintai's plight.

'Let's see, do we have everything here? Venom, bark, berries, bog.... Seems so! Give me just a moment then....\n\n'There. Those items have been fashioned together. Now it needs to sit for several hours and steep to properly finish it. While it does, I believe there is one more thing we must do in order for this salve to work permanently, and not merely be a passing hope for the Kintai.'
Return to Cúridwan in Kûgrun with the ingredients you've gathered
Salves for a Ravaged Land, Part 3
